## display() function

Decorates a property to be displayed as a child of the containing object. Supported for `GameObject` values, or `string` / `number` values to display them as text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function display(options?: IDisplayOptions): PropertyDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [IDisplayOptions](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional positioning and styling options. |

**Returns:**

PropertyDecorator
